snippet: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a look at the quants who helped President Obama win re-election, a Pixar building named for Steve Jobs and the...
abstract: The technology reporters and editors of The New York Times scour the Web for important and peculiar items. Wednesday's selection includes a look at the quants who helped President Obama win re-election, a Pixar building named for Steve Jobs and the latest from Mary Meeker.

headline.main: Today's Scuttlebot: Obama's Data Crunchers, Movie Computers and the Perils of E-Voting
